name: The BoJack Horseman Story, Chapter One
summary: To help with the memoir he hopes will put him back in the spotllight, BoJack hires a ghostwriter.

name: BoJack Hates the Troops
summary: BoJack finds himself the subject of national media attention after he calls the troops ''jerks''.

name: Prickly-Muffin
summary: BoJack reconnects with a friend from his past who moves into his house and creates pandemonium.

name: Zoës and Zeldas
summary: BoJack decides to mentor Todd; Diane's ex-boyfriend writes an article about Mr. Peanutbutter.

name: Live Fast, Diane Nguyen
summary: A business trip for BoJack and Diana takes a detour; Todd runs a scam that gets him in trouble.

name: Our A-Story is a 'D' Story
summary: BoJack is jealous of Diane's relationship wtih Mr. Peanutbutter; Todd's in a new environment.

name: Say Anything
summary: BoJack sabotages himself with an epic bender; Princess Carolyn's agency merges with another.

name: The Telescope
summary: When he learns that his old friend from ''Horsin' Around'' is dying, BoJack tries to mend fences.

name: Horse Majeure
summary: A lovestruck BoJack tries to sabotage a wedding; Todd accepts a surprising new professional role.

name: One Trick Pony
summary: BoJack shoots a movie at Mr. Peanutbutter's house; Diane finishes her book.

name: Downer Ending
summary: BoJack embarks on a project in his typically gonzo style, leading to a drug-fueled revelation.

name: Later
summary: Months after his memoir is released, BoJack's being considered for a role that's a lifelong dream.

name: Brand New Couch
summary: BoJack believes an upbeat attitude will change his life, but that attitude doesn't mesh well with his new acting job.

name: Yesterdayland
summary: BoJack is drawn to the one female in town who has no idea who he is (because she was in a coma). Todd opens a theme park.

name: Still Broken
summary: A funeral turns into a treasure hunt for the ''Horsin' Around'' cast, and a potential schmooze-fest for Princess Carolyn and Mr. Peanutbutter.

name: After the Party
summary: Princess Carolyn, BoJack, Diane and Mr. Peanutbutter learn some important lessons about love in the wake of a surprise birthday party.

name: Chickens
summary: BoJack really wants his director Kelsey to like him. Todd, Diane and Kelsey's daughter help a chicken who's on the lam from the police.

name: Higher Love
summary: Princess Carolyn sees an opportunity when Mr. Peanutbutter's agent dies. BoJack flips when he says the ''L'' word out loud to Wanda.

name: Hank After Dark
summary: Diane goes off script during BoJack's book tour, jeopardizing Mr. Peanutbutter's new show. Todd gets involved in international affairs.

name: Let's Find Out
summary: BoJack is one of the celebrity guest stars on the first episode of Mr. Peanutbutter's game show, but the game doesn't go as expected.

name: The Shot
summary: BoJack cooks up a scheme with Kelsey, Todd, Princess Carolyn and Mr. Peanutbutter to steal a crucial shot for the Secretariat film.

name: Yes And
summary: Todd gets sucked into the cult of improv comedy. Wanda thinks Diane is a bad influence on BoJack when he has to deal with a career crisis.

name: Escape from L.A.
summary: BoJack goes on a road trip to visit an old friend, and gets a taste of existence outside the Hollywood bubble.

name: Out to Sea
summary: The important things in life become clear to BoJack when Todd moves out to join the improv comedy group on their special cruise ship.

name: Start Spreading the News
summary: Ana Spanakopita sends BoJack to New York to do interviews, and Todd tags along. Princess Carolyn tells Mr. Peanutbutter to get back to work.

name: The BoJack Horseman Show
summary: In 2007, Princess Carolyn finds a new project for BoJack, Diane meets Mr. Peanutbutter at the coffee shop where she works, and Todd kisses a girl.

name: BoJack Kills
summary: BoJack is framed for the murder of a Whale World dancer. Mr. Peanutbutter and Todd get into a stinky situation with the skunk next door.

name: Fish Out of Water
summary: BoJack takes an underwater trip to the Pacific Ocean Film Festival for the "Secretariat" premiere, where he tries to reach out to Kelsey.

name: Love and/or Marriage
summary: While Todd and BoJack crash a rehearsal dinner, Diane gets high with a client. Princess Carolyn goes on a series of blind dates.

name: Brrap Brrap Pew Pew
summary: Diane's tweet lands Sextina Aquafina in hot water. Prankster and A-list actor Jurj Clooners gets under BoJack's skin.

name: Stop the Presses
summary: Todd builds a giant papier-mâché Todd head. A customer service rep gives BoJack some sound advice when he tries to cancel his newspaper subscription.

name: Old Acquaintance
summary: Bojack is up for a part in David Pincher's latest film. Diane meets Mr. Peanutbutter's brother and Todd takes the business in a new direction.

name: Best Thing that Ever Happened
summary: BoJack meets Princess Carolyn at Elefante, leading to a night of soul-searching as they help the staff impress a food critic.

name: It's You
summary: Mr. Peanutbutter announces the Oscar nominees. BoJack surrounds himself with admirers, but his real friendships are falling apart.

name: That's Too Much, Man!
summary: On a drug-fueled bender, BoJack and Sarah Lynn crash an AA meeting, and BoJack decides to make amends to the people he hurt.

name: That Went Well
summary: Mr. Peanutbutter saves the day. Todd gets exciting news. BoJack, Diane and Princess Carolyn pursue new opportunities.
